(Program 
  (Statement 
    (Arg 
      (Primary 
        (If 
          (Elsif 
            (Else 
              (Statement 
                (Arg 
                  (Primary 
                    (Lhs 
                      (Variable 
                        (Identifier "bat"))))))) 
            (Then 
              (Statement 
                (Arg 
                  (Primary 
                    (Lhs 
                      (Variable 
                        (Identifier "baz"))))))) 
            (Statement 
              (Arg 
                (Primary 
                  (Lhs 
                    (Variable 
                      (Identifier "quux"))))))) 
          (Then 
            (Statement 
              (Arg 
                (Primary 
                  (Lhs 
                    (Variable 
                      (Identifier "bar"))))))) 
          (Statement 
            (Arg 
              (Primary 
                (Lhs 
                  (Variable 
                    (Identifier "foo")))))))))))
